title: Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- September 04 ,2019.
text:
Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- September 04 ,2019.

Commodities 26 minutes ago (Sep 04, 2019 13:20)

Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- September 04 ,2019. Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- September 04 * Edible oil prices were mixed in the early trades. * Groundnut oil prices moved down due to low retail demand. * Castor oil eased due to restricted demand from exporters. * Palm olien firmed up due to thin supply. Today's Arrivals; --Groundnut, in 35-kg bags: 0,10,000 versus 0,04,000 previous --Castor seed, in 75-kg bags:0,02,000-0,03,000 versus 0,14,000-0,15,000 previous Groundnut deliveries in 35-kg bags, and
